ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Climate scenarios used were from the NEX-GDDP data set, prepared by the Climate Analytics Group and NASA Ames Research Center using the NASA Earth Exchange, and distributed by the NASA Center for Climate Simulation (NCCS). BvR was supported through NSF grant No. 1243095, an NCAR-ASP Faculty Fellowship Grant, as well as financial and in-kind support from the Boston University Pardee Center for the Study of the Longer Range Future. The National Center for Atmospheric Research is sponsored by the National Science Foundation under grant No. 929635. ISW was supported by the US National Science Foundation through the Network for Sustainable Climate Risk Management (SCRiM) under NSF cooperative agreement GEO-1240507, and by the U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Science, Biological and Environmental Research Program, and MultiSector Dynamics Program, Grant Nos. DE-SC0005171 and DE-SC0016162.
